channel.title: Comments on: Discovering new things (for me) in SSMS
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Colleen
item.dc:creator: Colleen
item.description: Now I have the answer to my question 'How is this view even remotely useful to me?' Thanks for the great tip!
item.content:encoded: Now I have the answer to my question ‘How is this view even remotely useful to me?’ Thanks for the great tip!

item.title: By: Dan Stinson
item.dc:creator: Dan Stinson
item.description: Excellent tip! I can't believe I've been using the tool so long and had no idea this feature was there.
item.content:encoded: Excellent tip! I can’t believe I’ve been using the tool so long and had no idea this feature was there.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: I tend not to use the designers a lot, most of my stuff is done in T-SQL
item.content:encoded: I tend not to use the designers a lot, most of my stuff is done in T-SQL

item.title: By: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.dc:creator: Jes Schultz Borland (grrlgeek)
item.description: This is useful! I didn't know about it either. I may add this to my SSMS presentation.
item.content:encoded: This is useful! I didn’t know about it either. I may add this to my SSMS presentation.
